author: probablynoam
content:
Hey everyone! Is there any updated guidance on the future of the existing testnets? I believe Kovan is getting sunset with OE's deprecation and Erigon not prioritizing support. There's also the new PoS testnets (Kintsugi) that are used to develop the Merge. Does anyone know if the following will remain as PoA or be converted from PoW to PoS? Will any of them be sunset (I heard Ropsten might be w/ Sepolia)?
- Rinkeby (PoA)
- Ropsten (PoW)
- Goerli (PoA)
